name:
Possessing 6 more Slaanesh Dedicated Advances than any other type allows Character to treat Perception Bonus as one higher for one of their 5 senses.
Possessing 7 or more Nurgle Dedicated Advances than any other type allows Character to treat Toughness Bonus as one higher vs Toxins and Poisons.
Possessing 8 or more Khorne Dedicated Advances than any other type allows Character to treat Weapon Skill Bonus as one higher for purposes of multiple melee hits.
Possessing 9 or more Tzeentch Dedicated Advances than any other type allows Character to treat Willpower Bonus as one higher for Psychic Power related tests.

system.novice:
- The Ritual Follows the "Rule of Sympathy", Sympathetic Objects, Rites, actions, and/or Location favour the God.
- The Daemon has been provided a Suitable Sacrifice to partake of upon arrival.
- The Enactor has an Artefact connected to the summoned Daemon.
- The Enactor has an Aetheme Blade or Rituals Kit
- The Enactor is a Psyker with Psy Rating 4-6
- The Veil between Reality and the Warp is weakened
- The Enactor knows part of a Daemon's True Name

description.value: Novice: - The Ritual Follows the "Rule of Sympathy", Sympathetic Objects, Rites, actions, and/or Location favour the God. - The Daemon has been provided a Suitable Sacrifice to partake of upon arrival. - The Enactor has an Artefact connected to the summoned Daemon. - The Enactor has an Aetheme Blade or Rituals Kit - The Enactor is a Psyker with Psy Rating 4-6 - The Veil between Reality and the Warp is weakened - The Enactor knows part of a Daemon's True Name
